Summary: Light traveled southeast to northwest made a tight U-turn northeast
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in car awaiting my friend to run an errand. i decided to do some overdue skywatching from our parkinglot two blocks east of disneyland as i sat with the window down. i noticed this faint (due to excessive lights in the area) but visible light effortlessly navigating through the sky from a southeast approach towards the northwest. all of a sudden it took a tight u-turn towards the northeast and seemed to disappear\phase out. at first, since it was going in a straight line, i thought it was a satellite. i was trying to recall what approach they have. then, when the turn took place, i realized it was a ufo. no starboard or port lights (green or red), only white.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around April 29th 2010
